page.title: 13WALPOLE PARK
page.content: {Save Walpole Park}cont. Question _ What do you think of the idea of building on{Walpole Park? 'I don't like the idea at all! I can see that, to the Council, the land is a valuable commodity, in terms of building space but, more and more Gosport people see its value in terms of{recreational space}and freedom. The park is of historical value. It is said that it was given to the people of Gosport by Lady Walpole in the 17th. century so that they could have a wide open space to enjoy in an ever_growing town! Question _ Don't you think that the 'plans' would give more trade, jobs and{leisure}opportunities? 'There are plenty of leisure facilities in our area. An ice rink has been suggested but could Gosport support one?
